Created attachment 553697
A simple testcase for text-shadow and position:fixed

I applied the text-shadow property (using rgba) to an element within a position:fixed wrapper. As soon as the wrapper is modified somehow with javascript (e.g displaying another container which is a child of the wrapper) the shadow is render incorrect.

To reproduce this problem have a look at the attached testcase. The problem still exists in Nightly 8.0a1 (2011-08-15).
comments.author: chris@madebyherzblut.com
comments.creator: chris@madebyherzblut.com
